cohort: mCRC patients on EGFR inhibitors as 1L therapy â€” focus on commercial payers over 60%
summary: Analysis of 1,156 mCRC patients treated with EGFR inhibitors in first line reveals significant variation in commercial payer mix. The average commercial payer rate of 65% exceeds the peer benchmark of 60%, representing a positive revenue impact of $2.1M annually. Notable variations in biomarker testing rates and treatment duration suggest opportunities for further optimization.
suggestions: Implement RAS testing quality improvement program
Develop EGFR inhibitor duration tracking dashboard
